about_the_game:
It's the Tidal Tribe soundtrack with 5 hours of music, provided in MP3 format.

name: Tidal Tribe - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Better have one
  • Memory: 42 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Doesn't matter, it's just music, you can even close your eyes
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: As long as your computer can play MP3s, you're fine

short_description: It's the Tidal Tribe soundtrack with 5 hours of music.
